changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on TPT (The Pets Table) checkout flow improvements, Factor Form OTP implementation, and UI refinements across multiple product areas. Several commits were reverted, indicating active debugging and iteration. The changes span Redux cleanup, new quiz components, cart service migrations, and mobile UI enhancements.

features.name: Factor Form Multi Cadence Account Settings UI
features.description: New UI for managing multiple cadence settings in Factor Form account settings

features.name: Factor Form OTP Cart Creation
features.description: One-time purchase cart creation functionality for Factor Form

features.name: Quiz Question Component for Feeding Plan Type
features.description: New quiz question component for determining pet feeding plan types in GD (likely Gentle Dogs)

features.name: Delivery Details Component
features.description: New component for displaying delivery details in checkout flows

features.name: Free Add-ons Unsubscribe Logic
features.description: Adds ability to unsubscribe from free add-on products

features.name: Zestify Reactivation Plan Summary
features.description: Plan summary interface for reactivating Zestify subscriptions

features.name: Mobile/Tablet Pagination
features.description: Pagination controls now visible on mobile and tablet devices

decisions.what: Redux usage cleanup on TPT checkout flows
decisions.rationale: Modernize state management and reduce Redux footprint in checkout flows
Changes caused issues requiring rollback, then re-applied after fixes

decisions.what: Revert Factor Form OTP cart creation
decisions.rationale: Implementation needed to be rolled back, likely due to bugs or incomplete integration

decisions.what: Change rootDir for whitelabel Jest configuration
decisions.rationale: Improve test organization and execution for whitelabel projects
Remove legacy code after successful cart service migration

refactors.reason: Modernize test implementation and improve reliability

refactors.area: Redux usage in TPT checkout flows
refactors.reason: Reduce Redux dependency and modernize state management
Remove legacy code after migration completion

fixes.issue: Order summary spacing in change plan flow
Virtual keyboard not closing when breed is selected
Asset contentful key updated to markdown for consistency

entities.name: TPT (The Pets Table)
entities.context: Multiple checkout flow improvements, UI fixes, and Redux cleanup

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: OTP implementation, cart service migration, and multi-cadence account settings

entities.name: GD (Gentle Dogs)
entities.context: New quiz question component for feeding plan type

entities.name: Redux
entities.context: Being cleaned up and reduced in TPT checkout flows

entities.name: Cart Service
entities.context: Migration completed with cleanup of legacy code

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: Asset key format standardization to markdown

key_patterns: Revert-and-reapply pattern indicating iterative debugging of Redux cleanup changes
Multi-brand architecture with shared components (TPT, Factor Form, Zestify, GD)
Active migration from legacy systems (Redux reduction, cart-service migration)
Ticket-driven development with clear Jira references (TPT-*, RTEVMS-*, GOC-*)
Component-based architecture with reusable UI elements
OTP (One-Time Purchase) functionality being added across multiple brands
